caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. At night, in a room, a man and a woman are sharing a bath together, both soaking in the bathtub and engaging in conversation. They display a high level of intimacy, and after talking for some time, they eventually embrace and share a kiss. The following morning, in a court or assembly hall, a woman accompanies an older man into the room. Meanwhile, in the assembly hall, several men are gathered around a table, with the man in the center appearing to be the decision-maker. The people below are reporting to him about various matters they have dealt with. As they are about to leave after addressing all the issues, the decision-maker stops one of the older men and asks him a question, to which the older man answers truthfully.
